title: 扭蛋機自製DIY｜超簡單版本｜不投幣｜Capsule Toy Vending Machine| DIY tutorial「DIY手作樂園＃04」

json.text: Ingredients: Box,cardboards, color papers, plastic bottle, some plastic capsules
Also a transparent sheet
Sketch the box
Cut it out
These is how i cut, window on top, Button at the middle, and the capsule exit below
Prepare the color paper by sketching it
Stick the transparent sheet behind to make the "window"
Prepare the bottle by cutting a square hole which just larger than your capsule's size a little
Cut two cardboards and stick inside, avoid the capsules moving too far from hole
Prepare a block by sticking some cardboards
Place and stick under the cut circle
Make a sliding plane and stick on it
Wait until the glue get dry
Prepare another "back wall" and stick to the back of the machine
Two cardboards, cut out circles, stick together
Stick below the window, tilting it
You can stick some small piece of cardboards beside the floor of capsules (flexible step)
Insert the bottle, then close it
Stick some cardboard sheets behind the bottle if it's not fit to your box
Cut the "door" behind, for the purpose of refilling the capsules
Wrap with color paper
Insert capsules
Well done！
Enjoy it ！
Play with your kids ^^
